restlib

Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.RequestBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class RequestBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for generating Request instances. RequestBuilder instances can be reused; it is safe to call build() multiple times to build multiple Request instances.

        Returns:
        this RequestBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if cacheDirective is null.

      • addCustomHeader

        public RequestBuilder addCustomHeader(Header header,
                             String value)
        Adds a custom header value to this builder.
        Parameters:
        header - a non-null non-standard header.
        value - a non-null valid header value.
        Returns:
        this RequestBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if header or value are null;
        IllegalArgumentException - if header is a standard header value or if value is not valid header value.
